definitions.definition: A dish or foodstuff where at least one piece, but typically two or more pieces , of bread serves as the wrapper or container of some other food .
Any combination formed by layering one type of material between two layers of some other material .
A layer cake or sandwich cake .
A sandwichman ( one who wears a sandwich board ) .

main_definition: A dish or foodstuff where at least one piece, but typically two or more pieces , of bread serves as the wrapper or container of some other food .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Any combination formed by layering one type of material between two layers of some other material .
( UK ) A layer cake or sandwich cake .
( archaic ) A sandwichman ( one who wears a sandwich board ) .
